description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Summer Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roasted Summer Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150 g Mix A Mato mini Tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the rocket leaves gently with the mixed, roasted vegetables and heap on to large plates. Scatter over the crushed hazelnuts and drizzle with the vinegar. Scatter over the mustard cress, if using, and serve immediately,
